      • checkTerminalKeys

        public boolean checkTerminalKeys()
        Check terminal card reader has Data RKI key or not.
        Returns:
        true if has RKI key, or false if not

      • getBatteryLevel

        public int getBatteryLevel()
        Get battery level: “7” – Battery is absent “6” – external power supply, battery has already completed charging. “5” – external power supply, and battery is charging. “4” – power 80% ~ 100% “3” – power 60% ~ 80% “2” – power 40% ~ 60% “1” – power 20% ~ 40% “0” – power 0% ~ 20%, -1 (other errors)
        Returns:

      • getTerminalInfo

        public void getTerminalInfo​(DeviceCallback deviceCallback)
        Retrieve terminal configuration information: deviceName: 0102 SerialNumber: 0101 termOSName:0126, termOSVer: 0127, termAppName: 0118, termAppVer: 0119 CLSSParam EMVParam - 012B UIParam TerminalCertificates TerminalRKIKeys
        Parameters:
        deviceCallback - an instance of DeviceCallback to deliver the TerminalConfig properties if the process is successful or error occurred in the process.
